Html:
First at all thanx on great work,

Other , Is there spupport for geofence calculation of cordinade data.

An Idea is to considering gps device is one place even if if we have small divergation of given cordinaceds

becouse GPS device is geting more accurate

Hi,

This library is only a very, very little part of  one of our main products. So, we only include functions if we need them. Because this procucts do not include any geofencing capabilities, geofencing is not part of the library yet and is also not in our todays developer pipeline.

This does not mean that we do not include this functionality in future realeases. Geofencing is always a strategic option for our main products.

This said, if you or anybody else wants to participate and incorpotate geofencing to this library, feel free to contact us and become a developer for this product.
